title: Castle in the Sky
description: A young boy and girl wander into a magical world above the clouds.
voice_actors: Mayumi Tanaka, Minami Takayama, Toru Furusawa

title: My Neighbor Totoro
description: Two young sisters move to the country with their father and discover magical creatures in the forest.
voice_actors: Hino Hinano, Sakamoto Chika, Nobuo Tsukamoto

title: Grave of the Fireflies
description: A heart-wrenching tale of two siblings struggling to survive in war-torn Japan.

title: Kiki's Delivery Service
description: A young witch, Kiki, moves to a coastal town to hone her magical skills.

title: Only Yesterday
description: A woman reflects on her life and first love while on a trip to the countryside.

title: Porco Rosso
description: A World War I flying ace turned pig fights air pirates over the Adriatic Sea.

title: Pom Poko
description: A group of shape-shifting raccoon dogs fight to protect their forest home.

title: Whisper of the Heart
description: A young girl with a love for books discovers her passion for writing.

title: Princess Mononoke
description: A young prince fights to protect a forest spirit from greedy humans.

title: My Neighbors the Yamadas
description: A humorous look at the everyday life of a Japanese family.

title: Spirited Away
description: A young girl is whisked away to a spirit world and must use her wits to survive.

title: The Cat Returns
description: A young girl is whisked away to a magical cat kingdom.

title: Howl's Moving Castle
description: A young woman is cursed and must seek the help of a powerful wizard.

title: Tales from Earthsea
description: A young prince must confront a growing darkness in his world.

title: Ponyo
description: A young boy befriends a magical fish princess.

title: Arrietty
description: A tiny girl and her family live secretly in the walls of a human house.

title: From Up on Poppy Hill
description: A young couple works to save their school's historic clubhouse.

title: The Wind Rises
description: A historical fiction about the life of Jiro Horikoshi, the designer of Japanese fighter planes.

title: The Tale of the Princess Kaguya
description: A bamboo cutter finds a tiny girl inside a glowing bamboo stalk and raises her as his own daughter. As she grows, her extraordinary beauty attracts unwanted attention, leading to a series of challenges and heartbreaks.

title: When Marnie Was There
description: A lonely girl spends a summer by the sea and befriends a mysterious girl named Marnie.

title: The Red Turtle
description: A man shipwrecked on a deserted island encounters a mysterious turtle.
